infotexts.entitydescription.jaratedepthcharge: Explosives and moonshine. Ready to commit war crimes, aren't you?
infotexts.entitydescription.jarateammobox: These are banned in all 124 countries around the world. At least pretend that you care
infotexts.entitydescription.jarashell: It's not a war crime if the victims won't ever tell anyone about it.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.jarate: It's like you have just been covered in sulfuric acid, but IT STINKS SO BAD!
infotexts.afflictiondescription.jaratebomb: Jarate is now literally running through your veins. You take even more damage from all sources
